info.title: Locations
info.description: The valid city location codes in SAP Concur. The location codes vary by client, and cannot be used across multiple clients. This API provides methods to get a list of valid locations for the supplied user, or get details of a location by ID.

OAuth2.description: To use this API, you need to get OAuth client credentials (client ID, secret, and geolocation) from SAP Concur, and be authorized to use the relevant scope. Refer to the full authentication information for more information.

get.description: Gets details of locations that are used by SAP Concur and that are valid at the user's company.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting point of the next set of results, after the limit specified in the limit field has been reached.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. Default value: 25.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A common name associated with the location. This name can be a location description such as a neighborhood (SoHo), a landmark (Statue of Liberty), or a city name (New York).

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: The city name of the location.

parameters.name: countrySubdivision
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-2:2007 country subdivision code for the location. Example: US-WA.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code for the location. Example: United States is US.

parameters.name: administrativeRegion
parameters.description: The administrative region of the location. An administrative region is a government unit, such as a county, that contains one or more cities.

get.description: Gets details of the specified location.

AdministrativeRegion.description: The administrative region of the location.

Country.description: The 2-letter ISO 3166-1 country code for the location.

CountrySubdivision.description: The ISO 3166-2:2007 country subdivision code for the location. Example: US-WA.

IATACode.description: The International Air Transport Association (IATA) airport code of the location.

ID.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

IsAirport.description: Indicates whether the location is an airport. Format: true or false.

IsBookingTool.description: Indicates whether the location is used by the booking tool. Format: true or false.

Latitude.description: The latitude of the geocode for the location.

Longitude.description: The longitude of the geocode for the location.

Name.description: The location name. Maximum length: 64 characters.

NextPage.description: The URI of the next page of results, if any.

HasValue.description: Indicates whether the location is used by the booking tool. Format: true or false
